name: Devoun's Basics 2
description:
Come and have loads of fun while learning maths with Twitch streamer and YouTuber extraordinaire, Devoun! In this educational game you can explore Devoun's schoolhouse and meet new friends! Try to find all of the notebooks and get all of the problems correct!

What are you waiting for? Go ahead and download the game and jump into a fun world of exploration, learning, and of course, FUN!

(All credit for the original game goes to mystman12. This is a mod. This is also not a legitimate education game. Enjoy!)
